Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal struck out six batters and did not allow an earned run over six innings to help lift the Tigers to a 3-1 victory over the Houston Astros.
Pre-Game Insights: Tarik Skubal's stellar performance from the regular season was expected to carry over into the MLB postseason.
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Espada credited Skubal for making key pitches and the team for battling until the end.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the first postseason victory for the Tigers since 2013 and the first time they qualified for the playoffs since 2014.
Houston Astros' Yordan Alvarez played for the first time since spraining his right knee on September 22.
Others: The second game of the best-of-three series is scheduled for Wednesday in Houston.
